messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] smoking and subject lines
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/14/03 10:06:44 AM, fetteroll@earthlink.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/14/03 10:06:44 AM, fetteroll@... writes:

<<
> If it would have bothered her I would have thought of something else. Every
> time she asked and I said, "well maybe tomorrow", she seemed perfectly
> satisfied with that answer. Never once showed any frustration or being at
> all bothered by it, just shrugged and decided to play something else.

What you did just happened to work out. It may have worked out because of
something in your daughter's voice or attitude or personality that made this
response feel right. >>

WoW, a post to the "smoking" thread that is actually about smoking again!!
Lara.......... who too, really wishes people would change the subject line
accordingly!!!
